webpage.para: This list shows the things that needs to be done urgently:

listitem.para: More documentation: many methods have not yet been described (See Javadoc Stats). Better documentation: each class can have example code on how to use that class.
More JUnit tests: not all methods of the core classes are tested.

webpage.para: This lists shows the things we would like to have/do:

listitem.para: An interface API to other programs and implementation (like Tinker, Gaussian, Mopac, Ghemical etc) using JNI or similar approaches

webpage.para: This is the lists of things we could use some help with:

listitem.para: A IUPAC name parser and a generator are being developed but can use some more attention.
